name: windsor
content:
Windsor noun
(TOWN)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a town in southeastern England, famous for its castle: The company offices have moved from London to Windsor. Louis-Philippe visited Queen Victoria at Windsor Castle in 1844.

Windsor noun
(KNOT)
[ C ] (also Windsor knot, uk/ˌwɪnd.zə ˈnɒt/ us/ˌwɪnd.zɚ ˈnɑːt/) a way of tying a tie that produces a neat knot that is wide at the top and narrow at the bottom: He stood before the mirror unknotting the plump Windsor of his tie. A Windsor knot can use up to three inches of fabric.
docksnflipflops/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
